name: Zoo Transporter Fun 2016 – Jungle animals Vs Farm Animal Mayhem
name_original: Zoo Transporter Fun 2016 – Jungle animals Vs Farm Animal Mayhem
description:
Love playing Animal games of cats and dogs. Well, try this twist in the animal games. A fun and educational game of transporting wild animal and zoo animal from the jungle across the farm and to the city Zoo respectively.

Load the bears, lions and elephants on the trailer truck and carry them to their cages in the City zoo. Have fun loading the bulls, sheep and goats too. Drive with care so that the animals don’t fall out or bump into the railings.

Your feedback is always welcomed. Do tell us what else would you like to see in the Zoo Transporter Fun 2016
